episodes.title: Criminalize Coercive Control and Free Cult Victims, One and All. A Talk with Chris Shelton
episodes.description: A conersation about mind control, and the sick ways in which predators prey on those of us most vulnerable, and least likely to put up a resistance. Chris Shelton, renowned atheist and critical thinker, breaks down the importance of activating the centres of the brain, (which, thanks to Mayim Bialik, I know to be called the striatal neuro circuitry,) that are rewarded by doing the right thing at all costs, rather than the socially convenient and easy thing to which we are conditioned.

episodes.title: "The gurukul kids were beaten." Talking to Sofija about Her Time in the Nithyananda Cult
episodes.description:
Thanks for tuning in to today's video. If I seem a little unprepared for the interview, it's because I was! Prior to filming, due to a funny little miscommunication, I thought Sofija was going to interview me for her channel! (Oops!) This was conducted basically blind, without my knowing anything about her prior to this Zoom call. If there's anything more you'd like to know, from Sofija or myself, please let us know in a comment.

I continue to publish content like this out of contempt for the Bidadi and Ramnagara police, through whom I attempted to file an FIR against the child abuse in the Nithyananda cult. They refused, and instead, allowed Nithyananda to bribe them, through the lawyer, via Achalananda Swami. This is not acceptable in my world. We have enough witnesses and direct victims now willing to speak; Interpol, FBI, CIA and all affected world police will soon zero in on the murderer, rapist, absconded fraud who dares to call himself Nithyananda, whom I call instead Mithyananda, delusional temporary silliness, not bliss.

episodes.description:

As a survivor of cult abuse and religious trauma by the fraud who calls himself "Nithyananda," I'm often hit with comments like, "Why don't you just move on with your life?" and "Don't you know it's not healthy to dwell on your negative experiences." This video is an answer to those who swallowed the toxic positivity pill, and are now trying to convince others to suppress their emotions, and enable criminals to keep hurting others.

episodes.title: Debunking the Sex Swami: How Nithyananda Breaks ALL FIVE of His "Sanyas Vows"
episodes.description:
Satya, Aparigraha, Asteya, Ahimsa and Brahmacharia... The fraud who calls himself "Nithyananda" demands his sanyasis live up to these five vows when they take the "sanyas" initiation into his monastic order. They translate to meaning Truthfulness, Renunciation, Non-Stealing, Non-Violence and Celibacy. Despite proclaiming himself to be a sanyasi, the fraud flagrantly breaks them ALL. In this video, I break down his hypocrisy with specific examples for each.

If you're enjoying my videos and want to support my work, consider becoming a patron on Patreon! You'll access exclusive content, include extended monthly readings, downloadable art drawn by me, an interactive inbox (that I actually check, unlike my other social medias) for private messaging and more. https://www.patreon.com/creator-home

If you like my jewelry, thanks! I made it! Request a custom order for something like the statement necklace I made here, or browse my collection. All the gems are natural, and it's my favourite way to support my "real" (though unpaid!) job of exposing this cult. http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheArtofGems

The experts I recommended in this (and other!) cult exposure videos are Dr. Steven Hassan and Dr. Janja Lalich. Their work is empowering and comforting to anyone coming out of a high control group, like the one I escaped, or an abusive workplace or relationship.

episodes.title: CULT RED FLAGS (Based on My Experience with the Fraud "Nithyananda")
episodes.description:
Hi and thanks for tuning in! I hope you're not actually in a cult, but if you are or feel you might be, don't worry, there's help available! The experts I mentioned in the video are linked below, and have helped many people escape toxic, high control groups like NXIVM, Scientology and more. 

The podcast interview will be up by next week on The Order of Chaos channel. I'll put a link here as soon as it's available, or follow me on Twitter where I'll post the link, as well as share regular Nithyananda cult updates: https://twitter.com/Sarah_S_Landry

Dr. Steven Hassan, Cult Recovery and  Deprogramming expert who create the BITE Model to recognize mind control. (When a leader and / or group control your Behaviour, Information, Thoughts and Emotions.) He was recruited into the Moonies, which he was rescued and deprogrammed from, launching his decades long pursuit to help others do the same.  https://freedomofmind.com

Dr. Janja Lalich, another leading expert in recovery from cult abuse and trauma imbued by charismatic, authoritarian figures and groups. She got out of a feminist political cult, and has since established herself as a leader in the psychological community with expertise in all kinds of abusive sects. https://janjalalich.com/about/

Dr. Rachel Bernstein, a wonderful therapist who specializes in cult abuse and deprogramming.  She famously appeared in both Scientology and the Aftermath as a cult expert, and Seduced, the story of India Oxenberg's escape from NXIVM. https://rachelbernsteintherapy.com/index.html

If you like what I do, consider supporting my work over on Patreon! It's more new-agey with Tarot content, art printables and stuff, but I'll occasionally delve into cult stuff there, too: https://www.patreon.com/SarahStephanieLandry

And last but not least, if you like my jewelry-thanks! I made it! Available here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheArtofGems

episodes.description:
In this interview, my friend Lanie, who was "Ma Nithya Oviyananda," shares her story of getting recruited into the Nithyananda cult, ignoring her intuition when she felt creeped out by the fraud "guru," and paying a huge fee for a program in India, becoming convinced she had to sell her house and move there, and what happened next... including a harrowing journey through South America with the absconded guru's entourage, cleaning up his mess in Ecuador, getting held captive in Trinidad, then finally breaking free.

For Dr. Steven Hassan's book and information about freeing yourself from mind control, please visit https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model/

episodes.title: What is True Spirituality with Steven Hodge, Whistleblower and Former Member of the Nithyananda Cult
episodes.description:
In this video, I interview my good friend Steven Hodge, whom I met in India back when I was an avowed Hindu nun in the cult of Nithyananda. Steven was there to attend a $15,000 program, which quickly left him disillusioned. Expecting guidance from the "master," it was a bait and switch, and kids from the "nithyananda gurukul" were put in charge of the participants. This created the perfect scene for Steven to interact with them one on one and realize something wasn't right in their residential school. In this discussion, he shares his views about enlightenment, spirituality and what's going wrong in the world of the fraud who calls himself Nithyananda. Next time we talk, we'll get into some specifics about the exact mind control methods used during the program he attended, and how he was able to wake others up and out of their brainwashed state.

The channel Steven started to help expose the cult can be seen here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkc95HdB6XmnVW1xH9MiJ1A

episodes.title: Life After Nithyananda: Talking with Jordan about Moving On, Overcoming Attacks and Speaking Out!
episodes.description: Thanks for tuning in! Jordan and I were once followers of the fraud "guru" who calls himself "nithyananda." It's been over a year since we last spoke about the abuse we experienced in his highly controlling cultic group, and in that time, we've both been hit with ridiculous false accusations and slander by people who we once considered friends. What more have we learned since then? And why do we feel like now, it's more critical than ever to keep exposing the fraudster? Watch and see.

episodes.title: Nithyananda Ordered Me to Attack Teal Swan: Abstract Watercolor Painting & SPIRITUAL DRAMA Storytime
episodes.description:
A few years ago, when I was a devoted follower of a fake guru, he instructed me (and three of my friends) to research Teal Swan, and make videos exposing her for plagiarism. His exact words were, "Make your video 80% facts, 20% personal attack." As a dutiful disciple, I did what he told me to do. In this video, I share the back story of how I got caught up with the fraud in the first place, why I started my own YouTube channel, and what my research revealed about Teal. Am I sorry that I went after her? Well... I'm more sorry I ever followed the fraud who calls himself Nithyananda in the first place. 

While sharing this story, I show my latest abstract watercolour painting, at 6x the speed. Apparently, I should have probably only sped it up to triple speed, because, well, I had more sh*t to say, lol. 

If you liked this video, please Like, Subscribe and hit the notification bell!

My Patreon page is: https://www.patreon.com/SarahStephanieLandry

episodes.title: Deeper Analysis of Cult Leader Nithyananda Love Bombing
episodes.description: In this unlisted video, I go into deeper detail of all the messages sent to me in early March of 2018 when I was going to drop out of the cult of Nithyananda. This is a two day chat in which he successfully pulled me back in to his cult through guilting me, by referring to himself as an "orphan," by promising me grandiose positions and telling me he thought I would be "the first enlightened face" of his sangha, and that he wanted to make me "mahamandaleshwar." This is typical behaviour from a narcissist trying to manipulate someone into their web.

episodes.title: Taking her Life Back: Joanna Spent 14 Years & $130,000 on Nithyananda, Now She's Speaking Out!
episodes.description: When I met Joanna, her name was Ma Nithyananda Geetapriya, and she was the yoga teacher at his Life Bliss Centre in Vancouver. This is her first interview since leaving his organization, and in it, she shares the story of how she fell into his trap, what it was like living as his devotee for 14 years, despite her family's lack of desire to join, how she got out, and what she's discovered since leaving.

episodes.title: Sneaking into the Nithyananda cult in India
episodes.description:
After hearing about the third eye awakenings and child abuse happening by Nithyananda, I was intrigued to see what was actually going on in the ashram in Bangalore, India! I went to visit the ashram but they wouldn’t let me in! I tried telling them I had a friend there but they only let me go behind the gate.


My experience here -
The man at the gate and people behind the gate were very respectful and treated me nicely. The man behind the gate did not accept our bribe and instead called the main office, whom let me inside. This is no way a reflection or attack on their character or practice. I actually feel bad for including them in the video but also want to share my experience authentically. This is simply my blunt opinion about the ashram, it's supernatural claims and courses.

episodes.title: Nithyananda Cult Talk: Ex-Leader Shares Her Experiences of Verbal Abuse, Sleep Deprivation and More
episodes.description:
My dear friend was once called Ma Nithya Priyaswarupananda by the cult leader Nithyananda. He made her the head of his organization's Slovakian branch, and she oversaw many other countries as well. While with the cult, she experienced mental, emotional and physical abuse that led to total burnout. She's now vibrant and happy, and ready to speak out.

If you have been hurt by the Nithyananda Cult, you're welcome to join the Facebook group Nithyananda Cult Survivors Official.

episodes.title: Nithyananda Cult Exposed: Emperor of Lies and Deceit
Nithyananda Cult Exposed: Interview with ex- adheenavasi Ana Arechiga | Part 3 [Jai Kali Ma]
episodes.description:
Character assassination for speaking publicly about the truth of who he really is. 

EDIT: I have to apologize I got the part wrong about Lenin going to jail for false rape allegation. It was in fact Vinay Baradwaj one of the original whistle blowers who went to jail for three years for false rape charges by Sadashivapriya. It happened while he was in the U.S.A.

episodes.title: Sensibly Speaking Podcast #216 Part 2: Sarah Landry and the Cult of Nithyananada
episodes.description:
This week I have a special two-part extended length podcast. Sarah Landry, a former member and spokesperson for the Nithyananda Dhyanapeetam, a religious organisation founded by Nithyananda and which she was involved with for 9 years. Her story is at once a cautionary tale about how people can be lured into cults and a testimonial of how fanatical people can become as a result. 
#Nithyananda #SarahLandry #ChrisShelton

episodes.title: Brainwashed by Nithyananda; Now I'm Speaking Out About his DANGEROUS CULT!
episodes.description:
Lessons learned. Please don't fall into the same trap I did.

If you have been abused by this guru or his cult, details to file a charge are given on this blog site. The creator of the blog can also be reached through the contact details to offer support and guidance to victims: https://nithyananda-cult.blogspot.com/2019/09/sarah-landry-starts-to-squeal-against.html#comment-form_5376076632412181707

Another online resource offering resources and court documents that expose the cult's charges of racketeering, and the rape case the guru has fled India to avoid, is a Facebook group called Nithyananda Cult or Culture. The blog makes some incendiary judgements about me and the role I played as the cult recruiter, but the facts they lay out about Nithyananda should not be ignored: https://www.facebook.com/NithyanandaCultOrCulture/

Most importantly, please do your own research into this cult, which matches the same characteristics as Scientology and NXIVM, and please don't fall into the trap of the false master before he leads everyone into a Jonestown style worst case scenario.

Thank you for your time, and I'm sorry for the terrible role I played in recruiting people there while under the influence of mind control.
